response.original_title: Married to Maggie - Denis Thatcher's Story
response.overview: Experience the life of Denis and Margaret Thatcher. Sir Denis Thatcher died in June 2003 aged 88. Despite his prominence as consort to his wife Margaret, he never spoke to the media, until he was persuaded by his daughter, Carol, to give his first, last and only TV interview to her, shortly before he died.
response.title: Married to Maggie - Denis Thatcher's Story
